Just a small little thread to discuss about the Raspberry Pi.

So, what have you guys done with them?
I own one. Still haven't really found a use for it.
I'd like to get one someday and put SteamOS on it. GabeCube micro!

Hey nova, how's that personal project coming?

Might be a real killer.

I'd like to get one someday and put SteamOS on it. GabeCube micro!

Hmm, I wonder, I'm gonna see what else I need to do to get hold of the SteamOS beta.

I'd like to get one someday and put SteamOS on it. GabeCube micro!

Nice idea.

i have one, but as a computer its not really useful and its a wiring nightmare. if you run it as a small server it works better. main reason i wanted it was for its gpio capabilities. im going to build a backpack for it with a switch mode power supply, lipo pack, usb hub, an arduino compatible mcu, and a nordic radio. i will probibly use it for the ground control side of a custom helicopter receiver i want to build.

Haven't gotten around to buying one yet, but have a few projects in mind for them - think they could make great syslog servers for a start.

Kind of like the idea of using one for a piratebox as well. http://wiki.daviddarts.com/PirateBox_DIY
